text: The Tomb of Yaghub Leys Safari was built by the Saffarid dynasty and this building is located in Gundeshapur in Dezful County, Khuzestan Province, Iran. It is the tomb of Ya'qub ibn al-Layth al-Saffar, the founder of the Saffarid dynasty. == Sources == Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:National Works of Iran
title: Tomb of Yaghub Leys Safari
